World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 8 日星期一 16:52:44 GMT 120
Legal migration to EU must increase as workforce ages, commissioner saysLegal migration to the European Union will have to increase by 1 million people a year to make up for losses in the bloc's ageing workforce, the EU's home affairs chief said on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:43:38 GMT FG43NU5UXVLF7BMMB6VGZOVSRI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/legal-migration-eu-must-increase-workforce-ages-commissioner-says-2024-01-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Spain considers nationwide hospital mask rule, as flu, COVID hit EuropeSpain's government proposed a nationwide mandate for people to wear masks in hospitals and health clinics on Monday, and Italy said respiratory illness infection rates had hit a record, as flu and COVID spread across Europe. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:37:47 GMT OAYIQW67OZJXBCMKAG2KLPNMNM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spain-considers-nationwide-hospital-mask-rule-flu-covid-hit-europe-2024-01-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Bosnian Serb leader tempers secession talk as U.S. exerts pressureThe nationalist leader of Bosnia's post-war Serb region said on Monday he had no plans to seek secession, appearing to step back from earlier calls for a breakaway republic just as the United States stepped up pressure against him. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:28:37 GMT NZNOKHE4MBIFNG5RYB3QF5XLAI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/bosnian-serb-leader-tempers-secession-talk-us-exerts-Pressure-2024-01-08/Ivana Sekularac世界欧洲
Bangladesh PM faces tougher, more uncertain new term, analysts sayStabilising a fractious political landscape and fixing an economy still reeling from the ripple effects of the Russia-Ukraine war should top Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's agenda for her next five-year term, analysts said on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:23:30 GMT YPLF44EVYVI6VNSCKZOUEQJCTA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladesh-pm-faces-tougher-more-uncertain-new-term-analysts-say-2024-01-08/Sudipto Ganguly, Ruma Paul世界亚太地区
Icon of German Left vows to save democracy, launches new partyAn icon of Germany's far left launched her own party on Monday, promising to rescue democracy in the European Union's largest economy from the threat posed by voters deserting traditional centrist parties for the far right. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:10:03 GMT QJ7KX25GDZIXHOQ3QS6LHWMDRE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/icon-german-left-vows-save-democracy-launches-new-party-2024-01-08/Thomas Escritt世界欧洲
Astrobotic's lunar lander suffers glitch in space, moon mission fate unclearA privately built moon lander launched Monday morning to make the first U.S. soft lunar landing in more than 50 years failed to enter its correct orientation in space, suffering what its owners termed an "anomaly" that calls the mission's fate into question. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:09:12 GMT CIG7OI7AXBNPNARBSA26QW4HDE https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/astrobotics-lunar-lander-suffers-glitch-space-moon-mission-fate-unclear-2024-01-08/Reuters技术空间
Congo security forces surround home of presidential runner-up KatumbiSecurity forces on Monday surrounded the home of Democratic Republic of Congo main opposition politician Moise Katumbi, who came second in the disputed presidential elections last month, one of his spokespeople said. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 15:47:17 GMT KUPLHF3Z4NJ3DMCTU5WFQQUVCI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-security-forces-surround-home-presidential-runner-up-katumbi-2024-01-08/Reuters世界非洲
Spanish court convicts arbitrator who awarded $15 bln to sultan's heirs in Malaysia disputeA Spanish arbitrator who awarded $15 billion to the descendants of a former sultan in a land dispute with Malaysia dating back to the 19th century has been convicted of contempt of court, it was announced on Monday, a significant victory in Malaysia's efforts to annul the case. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 15:44:25 GMT TOSJ2W5RUZPHPCVARGCYEQ5YFE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spanish-court-convicts-仲裁员-who-awarded-15-bln-sultans-heirs-malaysia-2024-01-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Germany sees 51% jump in 2023 asylum applicationsGermany saw asylum applications jump by around half last year, according to official data released on Monday, adding to pressure on the government to make good on its promises to bring down irregular migration. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 15:38:01 GMT 4FN2XXFP5JMKTHNFPUHRFPS7YI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/germany-sees-51-jump-2023-asylum-applications-2024-01-08/Reuters世界欧洲
New tensions stir old fears on island near North Korean borderAs Kim Jeoung-hee huddled in a bomb shelter on South Korea's Yeonpyeong Island, scared and confused with around 250 other people, memories flooded back of the day in 2010 when North Korean troops shelled near their homes. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 14:01:39 GMT BAOE62U3SZL6BPHAIQYTFHH3GU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/new-tensions-stir-old-fears-island-near-north-korean-border-2024-01-08/Ju-Min Park, Minwoo Park世界亚太地区
US fighter jets to fly over Bosnia in warning to 'secessionist' SerbsTwo F-16 fighter jets will fly over Bosnia on Monday to underline U.S. support for its territorial integrity against "secessionist activity" by Serbs at odds with the country's 1990s Dayton peace accords, the U.S. embassy in Sarajevo said. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 13:21:34 GMT FAYX6GLAXJMQ5J72QCS2XZ2LD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/us-fighter-jets-fly-over-bosnia-warning-secessionist-serbs-2024-01-08/Reuters世界欧洲
